sense.name: a pre-arranged gathering
sense.commentary: A meeting that has an agenda and is usually pre-arranged. Refers to the body of the meeting, not to the act of meeting.
sense.examples: The Pacific Northwest Writer's Conference is held every July in Seattle. John was elected moderator of the conference. The conference decided to hold a vote on the issue. We scheduled a conference for next Tuesday.

sense.name: a league
sense.commentary: The grouping of a number of teams or players that compete against each other.
sense.examples: John led the conference in yards-per-reception. The Miami Dolphins are in the American Football Conference.

sense.name: discussing or meeting
sense.commentary: Having a discussion with a specific topic. Refers to the act of meeting, not to the body of the meeting. It might help to think of this sense as a resultative noun of the verb 'confer'.
sense.examples: Wives in conference means trouble for husbands. No amount of conference could resolve our problems.
